oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Uncle George Lamons drives his mountain sled guided by Bob, his ox
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: An elderly bearded man stands in a wooden mountain sleigh, which is pulled by an ox. They are in a rural setting in front of a wooden barn.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country life; Cattle; Sleds & sleighs; Barns; Farming; Men
